title: tokyohd
author: tokyohd
content: VALR, a cryptocurrency exchange backed by American hedge fund Pantera Capital, has announced that its users will be able to trade meme coin Shiba Inu (SHIB) against the USDC Dollar (USDC) stablecoin in the coming weeks. On Aug. 16, VALR will add support for ETH/USDC and BNB/USDC trading pairs. In the near future, it will also allow trading XRP, Solana (SOL), and Avalance (AVAX) against the second-largest stablecoin.Read more on U.Today https://u.today/new-shiba-inu-shib-pair-to-be-listed-by-pantera-capital-backed-crypto-exchange

comments.author: bittick
comments.body: So, what's next? Still waiting for shiba inu to be listed on nasdaq but come on man that exchange site was also a quite small exchange site. I see that if it has no impact to the price of shiba inu. You shall wait until it will be listed on NASDAQ and then so many billionaire can pump shiba inu on nasdaq. Any new listing for shiba inu seems to be a worthless news these days. It seems bitcoin is the only thing that make the price of shiba inu to go up

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: bittick on August 13, 2022, 05:06:20 AMSo, what's next? Still waiting for shiba inu to be listed on nasdaq but come on man that exchange site was also a quite small exchange site. I see that if it has no impact to the price of shiba inu. You shall wait until it will be listed on NASDAQ and then so many billionaire can pump shiba inu on nasdaq. Any new listing for shiba inu seems to be a worthless news these days. It seems bitcoin is the only thing that make the price of shiba inu to go upI'm a bit surprised to hear that, Nasdaq? If really listing on Nasdaq, that pumping over 100%, or maybe sarcastic sentence?. I have to be realistic if Elon mention Shiba the price will pumping up than other exchange news

comments.author: Tony116
comments.body: As Shiba has already been listed on a number of major exchanges, it is only a matter of time and legitimacy before it is listed on smaller exchanges as well. This isn't the kind of news that's remarkable and won't cause any significant hype for shiba.Quote from: Sarah Azhari on August 13, 2022, 06:03:26 AM I have to be realistic if Elon mention Shiba the price will pumping up than other exchange newsI agree, being listed on small exchanges is not a big news right now. If you want shiba to be heavily advertised right now, it's more realistic to have Elon mention it or a big news like listed on nasdaq. LOL, this is the craziest thing I read today.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: Quote from: Tony116 on August 13, 2022, 08:45:36 AMQuote from: Sarah Azhari on August 13, 2022, 06:03:26 AM I have to be realistic if Elon mention Shiba the price will pumping up than other exchange newsI agree, being listed on small exchanges is not a big news right now. If you want shiba to be heavily advertised right now, it's more realistic to have Elon mention it or a big news like listed on nasdaq. LOL, this is the craziest thing I read today.I don't think it has any effect, like today the price more reduce over 10% from yesterday and everyone afraid in going more dump. I admit until this post was created on 13 August, the price was almost 2x or 100% growing up, but it's just a while a day, and some traders sold a lot of.

comments.author: gunhell16
comments.body: Quote from: tokyohd on August 13, 2022, 12:47:02 AMVALR, a cryptocurrency exchange backed by American hedge fund Pantera Capital, has announced that its users will be able to trade meme coin Shiba Inu (SHIB) against the USDC Dollar (USDC) stablecoin in the coming weeks. On Aug. 16, VALR will add support for ETH/USDC and BNB/USDC trading pairs. In the near future, it will also allow trading XRP, Solana (SOL), and Avalance (AVAX) against the second-largest stablecoin.Read more on U.Today https://u.today/new-shiba-inu-shib-pair-to-be-listed-by-pantera-capital-backed-crypto-exchangeIf anyone here in the cryptocurrency business industry believed that SHIB will boom again in the future, just like what happened before when Elon Musk did posted in the twitter.Â  But if it is just going through the listing of SHIB on the new exchange platforms, I don't think it will help much in raising its value in the market. It seems that recently SHIB was also listed on a new exchange whose name is Bluebit if I'm not mistaken, and now it's Pantera. So I can only believe that its price will kick in the market if Elon Musk makes SHIB post on Twitter something nice about it again. In this matter, the chances are high that its value will boom again, that's for sure.

comments.author: blockman
comments.body: I don't know why this has to be a news. It's like that every crypto that's being listed on any exchange, they make a news. Well, I guess that's part of the PR.But this is shiba inu and there are many exchanges that supports it. Anyway, a milestone is it for those who are actually following its growth?

comments.author: SistaFista
comments.body: I don't know whether you are trying to promote Shiba Inu coin or Pantera exchange.But anyone can make new exchange and list top coins on it to gain more users.The most difficult for startup crypto exchange is to gain trust from its users, it needs huge amount of money and time.
